Question: Ucreate International Co., Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ucreate International Co., Limited

Product: PCBs and PCB Assembly

- Specializes in 1-36 layers PCB, including rigid, flex, rigid-flex, and metal core PCBs
- Offers PCB design, assembly, testing, prototype, and components sourcing services
- Provides turn-key and partial turn-key PCB assembly services
- Capable of high-volume production and high difficulty PCBs
- Committed to high-quality services and long-term customer relationships
- Offers comprehensive PCB and assembly testing services
- 100% AOI inspection and compliance with ISO, UL, CE, IATF, RoHs, and Reach standards
- Devoted to creating a super Electronic Collaborative Manufacturing Service system (ECMS) for PCB fabrication, SMT, and electronic components sourcing

Contact: Email: sales@ucpcba.com, WhatsApp: 86-13798955467, Skype: guan418518621
Summary_cn:
Ucreate International Co., Limited

产品：PCB和PCB组装

- 专注于1-36层的PCB，包括刚性、柔性、刚柔性和金属基板PCB
- 提供PCB设计、组装、测试、样机和元器件采购服务
- 提供全套和部分全套的PCB组装服务
- 能够进行大批量生产和高难度的PCB制造
- 致力于提供高质量的服务和长期的客户关系
- 提供全面的PCB和组装测试服务
- 进行100% AOI检测，并符合ISO，UL，CE，IATF，RoHs和Reach标准
- 致力于为PCB制造、SMT和电子元件采购创建超级电子协同制造服务系统（ECMS）
